Following our Iteration 2 retrospective, we identified communication as the area we needed to improve. The daily updates suggested in the deck were very helpful in keeping us accountable, ensuring progress on the project no matter how small. These updates also helped us understand what others were working on, allowing us to identify remaining tasks. We also realized the importance of communication in a project like this, since we all work on components that depend on the work of others. Prioritzing consistent communication helped us clarify expectations and ensure that we were all working towards the same end product, creating code that can be integrated easily. ☁︎ How large is the project (number of methods, classes, etc)? How much of this is (roughly) devoted to each major system component?
